title: mondaysRmurder Episode 2: Guilty or Innocent? Zach Witman
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Why would you leave the key in the lock where somebody could actually see it, you might  as well just leave the door unlocked because everybody assumes doors are locked and they won’t try to get in. This makes no sense.  Nothing in this entire case makes sense.
I look forward to these stories every Monday morning. Thanks Mary for taking the time to make them.
Thanks for sharing! I've never heard about this case. I enjoyed listening to your theory. RIP Gregory, prayers for the family!
Well - by now we all know he has confessed, and he's been paroled.

He confessed, that kind of killed off any doubt for me, reasonable doubt or not.  
But the police work (or the report on the police word) did leave a lot to desier.
description: Who killed Gregory Witman? A $100,000 reward is being offered to the person whose tip leads to the release of Zachary Witman from state prison. The confidential tip line is (717) 819-6006. More information can be found at www.zachwitman.com.
